actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide a tax revenue source for State and local entities by the reduction and elimination over a 4-year period of the taxes imposed under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 on cigars, cigarettes, cigarette papers and tubes.

summary.text: Eliminates, by June 30, 1977, the taxes imposed under the Internal Revenue Code on cigars, cigarettes, cigarette papers, and tubes. Reduces the tax on such products over a four year period ending June 30, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to provide a tax revenue source for State and local entities by the reduction and elimination over a 4-year period of the taxes imposed under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 on cigars, cigarettes, cigarette papers and tubes.
